changes.description: The 'send hugs for post' endpoint now sends a message as well as a hug to the user who wrote the post in order to allow users to do both without having to perform the actions separately.
The 'send hugs for post' endpoint now expects a JSON payload with a message to send the user who wrote the post.
Added a helper function for fetching a thread ID for a thread between two users. If the thread doesn't yet exist, the method creates the thread and then returns the new thread's ID.
